tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Dental X-Ray,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dear All,

I’m here to share my first Dental visit experience, 
Recently I visited sunshine dental care in Rt.Nagar,Bangalore.

As my Tooth had been hurting for months. I have undergone composite restoration and wisdom tooth extraction.
Composite restoration is a treatment done to my decay tooth, after this my tooth restored back to normal function and shape which also helps for preventing further decay.

I wanna share that I had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Parveez, He is very professional and he takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice, It's not easy to find a good dentist. 
And surprisingly this is my first visit to a dentist. If any one of you have fear of dentists once go and visit sunshine dental care. I highly recommend Dr. Parveez. He made me feel less nervous about my treatment. Your efforts are much appreciated Dr. 
After my visit my best suggestion is that An early first visit to the dentist could arrest the progress of dental caries.

Remember the thing that No one can take our smile away when dental decay is kept miles away.

Thank you so much Dr. Syed Parveez Ali's - Sunshine Dental Care

Regards
Sai Krupa Bandari
reply_text:
Dear
Ms. Sai Krupa Bandari, we are glad to know you had good experience with us during the composite restorative procedure and wisdom tooth extraction. We want to acknowledge you were very cooperative, supportive all through out the procedure.
Thank you for your trust in our ability, kind words and feedback appreciation.
Regards
Dr. Syed Parveez Ali
Sunshine Dental Care

review:
I had the privilege of experiencing Dr. Syed Ali's exceptional dental care during a recent visit for a composite laser-guided restoration on my molar. From the outset, Dr. Ali's patience in diagnosing the issue and his dedication to explaining the complexities of the procedure were truly impressive. His transparent and accessible communication style immediately instilled confidence.

What truly distinguishes Dr. Ali is not only his technical prowess but also his commitment to personalized service. He not only identified the root cause of the problem but also proposed a non-invasive solution, showcasing a rare blend of expertise and consideration for his patients. The end result was a flawless restoration that exceeded my expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Syed Ali for those seeking not just dental care but an unparalleled and personalized experience.
reply_text:
Dear
Mrs Suman Saha. Thank you for valuable feedback. We are glad our dental services are highly appreciated. we look forward for your continuous patronage.  
Regards
Dr. Syed Parveez Ali
Sunshine Dental Care

review: as I was suffering from huge jaws pain due to inflammation of skin near wisdom tooth also having bad odour on mouth due tooth unconditionality and some tooth decaysby once I start to explain the doctor clearly demonstrated the cons of the issue and started giving the best remedies with majority of alternatives which eradicates the problem.by which I got my tooth deep clining for the first time which gave me the new look for the tooth. also tooth filing was Cristal and clear at last had taken of my skin causing problems near my wisdom teeth.during the whole process doctor was very suggestive and caring on the patients and dedicatedly working on to heal your problems permanently ....it was a over all great experience for better health-Suhas V
